fields.fieldDescription: The Record ID (RID) that uniquely identifies this preferred remittance association.
The Record ID (RID) for the remittance container or mass deal sale transaction.
The Record ID (RID) for the remittance instruction.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
Timestamp from when this row was created.

"Setting this indicator to true, when selecting a remittance instruction for use as a ""preferred"" remittance instruction should enable the cash to flow automatically when the transaction is released."
A value of true means that this is the preferred instruction for use as the host bank instruction which corresponds to the remittance instruction specified for the customer on a cashflow.
